account_verification.subject: $firstName $lastName ($username), Please Verify Your Email Account in $portalTitle
body: Someone has created an account with this email address. If this was you,
click the link below to verify your email address
This link will expire within $validTime minutes.
If you didn't create this account, just ignore this message.

email_update_verification.subject: $firstName $lastName ($username), Please Verify Your Email Account in $portalTitle
body: Please click on the following link to confirm your email address
and complete updating your email address
This link will expire within $validTime minutes.

password_reset.subject: Password Reset Request for $firstName $lastName ($username)
body: Someone has initiated a password reset request for the account associated with this email address.
If this was you, click the link below to verify it was you.
This link will expire within $validTime minutes.
If you didn't request a password reset, just ignore this message.

gateway_request.subject: New Gateway Request
body: $firstName $lastName has initiated a new Gateway request.
Please click the link below to verify the request.

update_to_admin.subject: Gateway Details Updated
body: There has been an update in the Gateway info for Gateway with ID - $gatewayId.
Please click the link below to view the changes.

update_to_user.subject: Gateway Details Updated
body: There has been an update in the Gateway info for your Gateway with ID - $gatewayId.
Please click the link below to view the changes.
